Amazon is now offering the ECOVACS Goat A3000 LiDAR Robot Lawn Mower at $2,099.99 shipped, which is coming down from its full $3,000 price tag, which is where it’s still priced at directly from the brand’s website. This model doesn’t receive as frequent discounts as its Goat O1000 and A2500 models, though we have seen it dropping between $2,600 and $2,500 most of the year, with more recent falls as low as $2,100 and a one-time Prime Day low of $2,085. You’re looking at the second-best price here while the savings stick around, giving you the most advanced robot mower from the brand’s lineup with $900 savings. You can also save more by going with the base Goat O1000 robot that is down at new $699 low right now for Christmas – with both models arriving before the upcoming holiday.

items.title: Jackery Xmas flash sale up to $1,700 off power stations: First deal on Explorer 300D 40W solar bundle at $249, more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas Holiday Sale, Jackery has launched a 72-hour flash sale with up to $1,700 savings across four particular units, dropping most of them to new and returning low prices, while also offering the first-ever deal on the latest Explorer 300D Portable Power Station with a 40W Air solar panel for $249 shipped. You can also find the standalone station for $169 shipped. The station recently snuck onto the scene with little media attention and normally goes for $219 at full price, while the flash-featured bundle goes for $359. This is the very first savings that we have noticed on this compact unit, which is nowhere to be found on Amazon. All-in-all, you’re getting a $50 markdown on the station and $110 off the bundle, which sets the bar for future discounts down the road. Head below to check out all the other 72-hour low prices while they’re still around!

more…

items.title: Get or gift this ratcheting leather belt for just $10.50 Prime shipped (30% off)
items.summary:
Zitahli Ratcheting Leather Belt

Buy for $10.50 (Reg. $15)

What we love

It doesn’t matter if your current go-to belt has seen better days or you’re looking for a quick and easy gift idea, this ratcheting leather belt is worth a look. I made the switch to this type of belt a year or two ago and have no desire to go back. They’re super flexible and look much sleeker compared to traditional belts in my opinion.

items.title: Razer’s originally $150 DeathAdder V3 Pro wireless gaming mouse is down to $70 today
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Razer’s DeathAdder V3 Pro wireless gaming mouse in white down to $69.99 shipped. This is originally a $150 unit that has fetched as much as $120 in recent months. It has lately been fetching $99, but it’s now seeing an additional discount that lands it $29 below its previous all-time low and our mention from August. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this mouse, and it’s a pretty good option to consider if you’re looking to grab a new one for your battlestation or get one as a gift. Alongside the black model, Amazon also has the Faker and Fortnite Editions of this mouse, though those versions aren’t seeing nearly as big a discount as the white one at the moment. Head below for more details.

more…

Prime-exclusive discount

What we love

We’ve covered cables that turn one USB-C output into two, but this one takes things a step further with three ports in tow. The cable itself can deliver up to 100W of power and distributes that between up to three devices.

items.title: Keep food warm at work or during other outings in Crock-Pot’s 20-ounce electric lunch boxes for $30, more from $36
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Crock-Pot 20-Ounce Electric Lunch Box at $29.99 shipped in all four colorways, which would make a great gift for your hard-working loved ones that prefer warm meals on the job or even for outings and the like – plus, it arrives well before Christmas for the time being. It normally runs for $40 at full price, which we’ve almost entirely seen taken down to this rate over the year, beaten out by a few deals that went a few dollars lower. It’s back for Christmas shopping needs, with $10 savings that lands it within a couple of dollars of its lowest rate. We’ve also collected a number of the brand’s other cooking devices/appliances below.

items.summary:

Today’s 21% discount shaves $33 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price we first tracked for this unit during the fall Prime Day sale. The white variant of this gimbal has also hit the $127 low today, and you’ll find its Creator bundle with some neat extras fetching $132.99 shipped instead of its usual $190 price. Head below for more details.

items.title: First savings just hit Navee’s newest feature-packed XT5 Pro long-range off-road electric scooter for $1,400
items.summary:
Navee’s official Amazon storefront is undercutting the brand’s direct Christmas Sale pricing on its brand-new XT5 Pro Long-Range Off-Road Electric Scooter for $1,399.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page $200 off coupon. This model just hit the market early last month with a $1,500 price tag, which is where it’s still priced direct from the brand. At Amazon, however, it started off priced at $1,700 and dropped to $1,600 right before Black Friday, with today’s deal being the first official chance at cash savings that we’ve spotted. While this deal lasts, you’re getting $100 off the going rate that sets the bar for future discounts, while also upgrading your commutes/joyrides with the brand’s take on a superscooter.

items.title: India Reveals DHRUV64, Country’s First 1.0GHz Processor
items.summary:

For those curious: the DHRUV64 is a 1.0GHz, 64-bit dual-core microprocessor that’s based on the RISC-V architecture. CDAC did not reveal how much power the chip consumes, […]
